It’s okay if you don’t know exactly when: It’s okay if you don’t know exactly when it took place. You can give your best guess or leave this blank.

Report to the credit bureaus, <0>Equifax: Report to the credit bureaus, <0>Equifax</0> and <1>TransUnion</1>, if your identity was stolen.

The RCMP will analyze your report and co: The RCMP will analyze your report and combine it with others that are similar, to help police across Canada track down cybercriminals.
